verbose_text: While treatment with metformin significantly reduces pluripotent stem cells markers, Oct4 and Ssea-1, with more limited effects on the expression of Sox2 and Nanog, treatment with the AMPK activator 5-aminoimidazole-4-carboxyamide ribonucleoside (AICAR) also markedly inhibits proliferation of ES cells and enhances erythroid differentiation by significantly reducing Nanog and Ssea-1 but without affecting expression of Oct4 XREF_BIBR.
evidence: metformin significantly reduces pluripotent stem cells markers, Oct4
